item.title: Enhance Your LLMâ€™s Understanding: Document Parsing Tips You Need to Know
item.description: In retrieval-augmented generation (RAG), uploading documents like PDFs or spreadsheets to a vector database helps extend LLM knowledge. Simply reading the file contents can lose important structure, so parsing into a structured format like Markdown is essential. Most LLMs, particularly OpenAI's models, perform best with this format.

item.title: Building Conversational AI with LangChain Part 2: Chat with Your Data
item.description: LLM is powerful, but it cannot answer questions it doesn’t know before. Thanks to RAG we can inject some knowledge to extend LLM capability. Now let’s build our first RAG!

item.title: Building Conversational AI with LangChain: Techniques for Context Retention in Chatbots
item.description: We moved from in-house training model to hosted models and ready-to-use APIs. With the existence of free LLM APIs, let’s explore how to create our own free chatbot!

item.title: Pain-free Python Fastapi RabbitMQ Integration
item.description: Despite of the powerfulness of FastAPI, I found it's not easy to work with threads and RabbitMQ. I was struggled for 3 days to find the solution. And here I'll share my findings on creating both RMQ based producer and consumer in single FastAPI app.

item.title: Restore your Noisy Image Using Autoencoders
item.description: Autoencoder network designed to learn data representation using its bottleneck network architecture. Now, we will discover autoencoder use case for image restoration.

item.title: Autoencoders: Your First Step into Generative AI
item.description: Generally, there are two popular basic variant of Generative AI: Autoencoders network and Generative Adversarial Network (GAN). In this series, we will discover the former one and leave the latter in another one.

item.title: Exploring Vision Transformers (ViT) with ðŸ¤— Huggingface
item.description: An Image is Worth 16x16 Words: Transformers for Image Recognition at Scale (Dosovitskiy et al., 2021)

item.title: Quick Export your Jupyter Notebook to PDF
item.description: What if I tell you there are some way to simply export your beloved notebook to PDFs?

item.title: Bag of Words vs TF-IDF â€” Penjelasan dan Perbedaannya
item.description: Bag of Words dan TF-IDF adalah 2 metode transformasi teks yang cukup populer. Mari kita bahas cara kerja serta perbedaannya!
